articles.title: Fed report warns of “vulnerabilities” in US financial system - WSWS
articles.description: Fed governor Lael Brainard said the collapse of the Archegos hedge fund had demonstrated the potential for nonbank financial institutions to generate risk for the entire financial system.
articles.content: The semi-annual Financial Stability Report, issued by the US Federal Reserve on Thursday, has warned that the rising debt of hedge funds, much of which is not recorded by regulatory authorities, pose… [+6284 chars]

articles.title: Record iron ore prices show crucial commodity is not immune to politics - South China Morning Post
articles.description: A fundamental demand for steel in China, coupled with worsening bilateral tensions, has pushed the price of iron ore beyond US$200 a tonne for the first time in 14 years.
